name: Don't Lose Your Head!
description:
Made for the Kenney Jam 2022  /  #kenneyjam   #kenneyjam2022

---

Crass, infinite runner styled physics game! 

Do your best to grow the mass of debris around you to protect your severed zombie head. Avoid obstacles, collect junk, bounce off ramps and try to beat your previous best score and your best distance!

BEWARE: Contains cartoon violence, poor taste humor and dead memes. Enjoy!
